info.name: Tick Tick Slim Editor
info.description: Larger sub-tasks / notes pane centered. Font changed to monospace for text, sub-tasks and description. Background subtle yellow on center pane to be easy on the eyes. Smaller fonts and slimmer rows in tasks list. Task list moved to the right.
info.additionalInfo: Based on wider task column and monospace ticktick.com by insanum.
